name: Summer Carnival '22: CrossGunr
description:
--PREPARE YOUR CROSSGUNS--

CrossGunr is a bullet hell inspired caravan shmup for the pico-8, made for the Lazy Devs Basic Shmup Game Jam, and with the help of Lazy Devs Academy Tutorials which can be found at the bottom of this page.

--CONTROLS--

Z/Button1 to shoot, HOLD for AUTOFIRE

X/Button2 to deploy EX Wave when READY, HOLD for AUTODEPLOY

Enter/Start to Pause or Reset Cart

--TIPS--

Use your CROSSGUNS to SAFELY ENGAGE THE ENEMY!

SHOOT THE ENEMY CONSTANTLY to BUILD EX

Use REPAIR when in DANGER! REPAIRS will REAPPEAR IF LOST!

KEEP MEDALS GOLD and SILVER for HIGH POINTS!

-- LEADERBOARDS --
